inclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class II, III, IVa or heart failure
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Excessive calcification or thickening of mitral valve annulus, severe mitral stenosis,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: fused commissures, valvular vegetation or mass
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 34 year old woman with Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, who was planned for a MV repair but was lost to follow-up. She remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
